__e: "Every time we had dinners he wouldn't start to eat until grandmother came
Why don't you and your friends chill, eat some sushi and stay out of the way until we need you?
From the time we were children, if you didn't put his food in front of him, he wouldn't eat.
Then that rat-bastard husband of mine ran off with a whore and left me with a mortgage I couldn't afford and a 16-year-old boy who ate cereal with a snow shovel.
And the only reason we had cereal dinner was because that's the only food I could make, since you were too upset to cook.
and there was this woman in this show that was just eating candy the entire time...
Leopoldo, how about before we leave town we grab a bite to eat?
- Yeah, well, I travel light... which is lucky for me, because the only way I could get here from the airport was to split a cab with a lady who was eating a sub from the middle.
Look, Milo, if I'm eating a sandwich my grandma made me, does that mean I have to give you half?
Next thing I knew I was in the back of the class with a guy who ate paste.
Whenever you'd get like this, we'd always have ice cream.
Isn't he the boy that used to eat dirt in the backyard?
I thought something had happened to you!
-What? -When I was little if I had a nightmare and I couldn't sleep, Mom and I ate an ice cream sundae.
He was having a piece of pizza a half hour ago.
My mother ate sugar when she was pregnant with me.
Remember when we started working on the house and we'd eat take-away on the floor?
Me and Mom were eating fish, having a great time. All of a sudden she pushes me into the bushes and tells me to be real quiet.
